note: Long time resident of California. Writer, singer, musician, aspiring thorn in the side of autocracy. Decidedly progressive in outlook, don’t like anything that other side is trying to do right now. Among my interests are politics, music, science , and the arts. Trying to sort my thoughts out about things by writing here. Hopefully I’ll help others to do this as well. “Government of the people, by the people, for the people, shall not perish from the earth.”
